Articles.Content: Is it possible to change the gamemode from career to sandbox and keep all flights and everything?

It is actually. It takes a little doing, but it's possible. First you have to start a new game in the game mode you want to go to. Then you just copy the save from your other game mode and paste it into your new game mode (The persistent save file)

Your persistence file is located in the "saves" folder of your KSP install directory. (A search for KSP on your C:\ drive should find it) in there you should open the folder labelled with the name of your save.

You will find "persistent.sfs" which can be opened with a text editor. (Most people just use notepad)

At the top of the file you will find the following line: Mode = CAREER

Change this to the desired game mode. (SANDBOX or SCIENCE)

Save your changes and load up KSP.

Profit.
